name: LittleDevil
description:
This is my Submission for brackey's Game Jam, You have to cause chaos while avoiding the angels,

I was unable to complete it XD but it is still in a playable state so there's that.

Controls:

Move with WASD or by clicking where you want to move.
You can cause a chaos blast by pressing E or Right Mouse Button when chaos meter is filled.

I hope you Like it <3
Thank you for Playing.
